casebody.data:
In the Matter of the Intermediate Accounting of Ernest J. Howe, as Executor of Hubert S. Howe, Deceased, Appellant. Estelle C. Howe, Respondent.

Decree, so far as appealed from, unanimously affirmed, with costs to all parties appearing separately and filing briefs, payable out of the estate. No opinion. Concur — Botein, P. J., Rabin, M. M. Frank, Yalente and Stevens, JJ. [15 Misc 2d 1044.]
